segments.text: I see the woman drying a plate, completely unaware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in a puddle of water, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so quiet, trying to get cookies from the jar without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting with her hand out, ready to catch a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around and see what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy, unlike the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the water before it causes a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children seem to be working together to get the cookies without being caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn't tip over and cause the boy to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so focused on drying the plate, she's missing everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR
